item.description:
Bob and Joe wrote to say: "I have a great place for a monthly listening party - this can really be a lot of fun and the owner is a jazz fan as well!"

So we're going to try a monthly iPod, CD or classic vinyl listening party at the E Room in Brookline on Tuesdays. We have the room!

"It's comfortable and there is also a small private room that can hold 20+ adjacent to the lounge where we can have converstation. This is also a great place to do a listening and intro for new artists releasing product locally. We can do this early 8:00 - 10:00 or whatever really works for the group we are very flexible!"

Bring your favorite CDs, LPs or iPod with playlists. This is a great chance to be exposed to some new music and hear what others are listening to. If you have recordings of local Boston musicians, please bring them!

Take the Green C line to the Washington Square T stop and walk 1/2 block along the south side of Beacon St. The E Room is in the Golden Temple restaurant.

For more information, see http://www.bostonjazz...
item.name: The Boston Jazz Listening Party at the E Room in Brookline
